testcase.name: Testing checkboxes functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user is on homepage...................................................passed When user clicks to the Checkboxes link.....................................passed Then user sees the Checkboxes text..........................................passed When user clicks to the first check box.....................................passed Then checkbox will be checked...............................................passed When user clicks to the second check box....................................passed Then checkbox will be unchecked.............................................passed And user quits the browser..................................................passed
